cast.name: 克莱夫·安德森 Clive Anderson
玛丽-安·奥乔塔 Mary-ann Ochota

trans_title: 神秘不列颠 第二季
introduction: Over Britain's tens of thousands of years of civilization, its history has played host to a series of strange and mysterious rituals, events, and cultures. British talk show host Clive Anderson and anthropologist Mary-Ann Ochota travel across the U.K. to explore the sacred sites and supernatural beliefs of the ancient Britons. By examining their mystic places and practices, they hope to unlock the secrets of their ancestors and better understand the worlds in which they lived.S2 E1 Lost Tribe of ScotlandS2 E2 Mystery of the White HorseS2 E3 The Monster of MaeshoweS2 E4 Isle of DruidsS2 E5 Mystery of the Red LadyS2 E6 The Quest for King ArthurS2 E7 Legend of the Warrior QueenS2 E8 Leeches, Plagues, and PotionsS2 E9 The Sand Bodies of Sutton HooS2 E10 Gods and Monsters
chinese_title: 神秘不列颠 第二季
